ApiKey.description: Gets or sets a Seq API key that authenticates the client to the Seq server.

DisableHealthChecks.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the Seq server health check is disabled or not.

BatchExportProcessorOptions.description: Gets or sets the BatchExportProcessor options. Ignored unless ExportProcessorType is Batch.

Endpoint.description: Gets or sets the target to which the exporter is going to send telemetry.

ExportProcessorType.description: Gets or sets the export processor type to be used with the OpenTelemetry Protocol Exporter. The default value is 'OpenTelemetry.ExportProcessorType.Batch'.

Headers.description: Gets or sets optional headers for the connection.

Protocol.description: Gets or sets the OTLP transport protocol.

TimeoutMilliseconds.description: Gets or sets the max waiting time (in milliseconds) for the backend to process each batch. Default value: 10000.

Logs.description: Gets OTLP exporter options for logs.

ServerUrl.description: Gets or sets the base URL of the Seq server (including protocol and port). E.g. "https://example.seq.com:6789. Overrides endpoints set on Logs and Traces."

BatchExportProcessorOptions.description: Gets or sets the BatchExportProcessor options. Ignored unless ExportProcessorType is Batch.

Endpoint.description: Gets or sets the target to which the exporter is going to send telemetry.

ExportProcessorType.description: Gets or sets the export processor type to be used with the OpenTelemetry Protocol Exporter. The default value is 'OpenTelemetry.ExportProcessorType.Batch'.

Headers.description: Gets or sets optional headers for the connection.

Protocol.description: Gets or sets the OTLP transport protocol.

TimeoutMilliseconds.description: Gets or sets the max waiting time (in milliseconds) for the backend to process each batch. Default value: 10000.

Traces.description: Gets OTLP exporter options for traces.

Seq.description: Provides the client configuration settings for connecting telemetry to a Seq server.
